1.5.name: wordpress/twiiter-wp-widget
1.5.description:
Using the Twitter WP Widget you can display feeds on your blog of your latest tweets, keeping your visitors interested in what you have to offer.

This sidebar widget allows you to set options on how many tweets to display, the time period to refresh your tweets and check for new ones (cache) and even choose from several different skins or themes. This is a simple to setup widget, which you can have up and running in minutes.

Features

  • Easy to install, setup and use.
  • Text area in admin panel to customize with your own css
  • Show you avatar and the number of tweets
  • Choose from multiple css styles including your themes css style
  • Turn you cashe on and off
  • Can be used under 4 differet languages(English, Frech, Spanish, Germen)
  • Support available and instructions provided
